content: this pattern is a co-creation between ann stiver-balla suki and ana amélia mendes galvão miahandcrafter the features of the face are made of felt the pattern says to join the rounds so the stripes work out evenly you can find the pattern on our blogs mia s atelier 1 sukigirl~~ 2 1 http //www miahandcrafter com/atelier/hobbes-plush-pattern/ 2 http //sukigirl74 blogspot ca/2013/10/heres-another-free-hobbes-crochet_14 html
